meta.title: Session 17: Digital India Services & AI in Governance
meta.description: A comprehensive guide to online government services (Identity, Schemes, Agriculture, Grievance Redressal) and AI-integrated platforms like UMANG and Ask Disha.

studyTopics.hint: Updating Aadhaar, applying for PAN and Passport online.
studyTopics.searchQuery: how to update aadhaar online and apply for PAN card NSDL
studyTopics.learningOutcome: Manage essential identity documents (Aadhaar, PAN, Passport, Voter ID) through official portals.

studyTopics.hint: Schemes for insurance, pension, and small business loans.
studyTopics.searchQuery: PMJJBY vs PMSBY and Mudra Yojana eligibility
studyTopics.learningOutcome: Understand and apply for key welfare schemes like PMJJBY, Atal Pension Yojana, and Mudra Loans.

studyTopics.hint: One app for many government services (UMANG) and digital wallet for docs (DigiLocker).
studyTopics.searchQuery: UMANG app services list and DigiLocker features
studyTopics.learningOutcome: Utilize unified platforms like UMANG and DigiLocker to access services and store documents legally.

studyTopics.hint: Online land records (7/12) and market prices (eNAM).
studyTopics.searchQuery: how to download 7/12 utara online maharashtra eNAM benefits
studyTopics.learningOutcome: Access land records digitally and understand digital markets for agricultural produce.

studyTopics.hint: Filing complaints against government or businesses.
studyTopics.searchQuery: CPGRAMS portal grievance registration process RTI online
studyTopics.learningOutcome: Exercise citizen rights by filing RTIs, Consumer Forum complaints, and Public Grievances online.

studyTopics.hint: Chatbots for train queries and toll payments.
studyTopics.searchQuery: IRCTC Ask Disha 2.0 features FASTag online recharge
studyTopics.learningOutcome: Use AI chatbots for travel assistance and manage FASTag for road travel.

studyTopics.hint: Apps for emergency safety and girl child savings.
studyTopics.searchQuery: Sukanya Samruddhi Yojana details Rakshak app features
studyTopics.learningOutcome: Utilize safety apps and apply for schemes benefiting women and children.

questions.question: Which mobile application is a 'Unified Mobile Application for New-age Governance' allowing access to hundreds of central and state services?
questions.explanation: UMANG (Unified Mobile Application for New-age Governance) brings major government services (PF, Aadhaar, Gas booking, etc.) into a single app.

questions.question: Ask Disha 2.0 is an AI-powered chatbot associated with which organization?
questions.explanation: Ask Disha 2.0 is the AI chatbot for IRCTC that answers queries related to train bookings, PNR status, and refunds.

questions.question: What is the primary purpose of 'DigiLocker'?
options: To store and share authentic digital documents (like Driving License, Marksheets) directly from the issuer
questions.explanation: DigiLocker provides a digital wallet to store legally valid digital documents issued by government agencies.

questions.question: Which government portal is used to file 'Public Grievances' regarding any central government ministry or department?
questions.explanation: CPGRAMS (Centralized Public Grievance Redress and Monitoring System) is the portal for citizens to lodge complaints against government authorities.

questions.question: To apply for a PAN Card online, which of the following portals is authorized?
questions.explanation: NSDL and UTIITSL are the two agencies authorized by the Income Tax Department to accept PAN applications.

questions.question: What is the '7/12 Extract' (Satbara Utara) primarily related to?
options: Land ownership records in rural areas
questions.explanation: The 7/12 extract is a crucial land record document in Maharashtra that details ownership, occupancy, and crop information.

questions.question: Pradhan Mantri Mudra Yojana (PMMY) provides loans primarily to:
questions.explanation: Mudra Yojana supports the development of micro-enterprise sector by providing refinance support to banks for lending to small businesses.

questions.question: Which tag is mandatory for vehicles to enable automatic toll deduction at toll plazas?
questions.explanation: FASTag is an electronic toll collection system that employs RFID technology for making toll payments directly from a prepaid account.

questions.question: What is the 'Soil Health Card' used for?
options: To check the health of the farmer
To check the nutrient status of the soil and recommend fertilizers
questions.explanation: The Soil Health Card gives farmers information on the nutrient status of their soil along with recommendations on appropriate dosage of fertilizers.

questions.question: Which portal allows you to search and apply for jobs across India and offers career counselling?
questions.explanation: The National Career Service (NCS) portal bridges the gap between job seekers and employers and provides career guidance.

questions.question: RTI stands for:
questions.explanation: The Right to Information (RTI) Act empowers citizens to request information from public authorities.

questions.question: Which scheme focuses on the welfare of the 'Girl Child' (savings scheme)?
questions.explanation: Sukanya Samruddhi Yojana is a small deposit scheme for the girl child launched as a part of the 'Beti Bachao Beti Padhao' campaign.

questions.question: eNAM stands for:
questions.explanation: eNAM is an online trading platform for agricultural commodities in India.

questions.question: Google AI Studio is mentioned as a tool to:
options: Build, prototype, and deploy AI models
questions.explanation: Google AI Studio is a platform for developers to build and experiment with generative AI models.

questions.question: Which digital platform invites citizens to share ideas and insights with the Prime Minister and participate in governance?
questions.explanation: MyGov is a citizen engagement platform that allows users to participate in discussions and contribute to governance.

questions.question: Atal Pension Yojana (APY) is primarily a:
options: Pension Scheme for the unorganized sector
questions.explanation: APY is a pension scheme focused on the unorganized sector to provide a steady income after retirement.

questions.question: What is the purpose of the 'Rakshak App'?
options: Safety of Women and Senior Citizens (Emergency alerts)
questions.explanation: Rakshak is a safety app designed to send emergency alerts to contacts in case of distress.

questions.question: Which of these is used to 'electronically sign' documents using your Aadhaar?
questions.explanation: eSign is an online electronic signature service that lets Aadhaar holders digitally sign documents.

questions.question: To apply for a Passport online, you must visit:
questions.explanation: The Passport Seva portal is the official platform for Indian citizens to apply for a passport.

questions.question: If you want to view work details under the rural employment guarantee scheme, which portal should you visit?
questions.explanation: The MGNREGA portal provides transparency regarding work details, job cards, and payments under the rural employment act.
